welcomePage.title: XML Schema Infoset Model (XSD)
welcomePage.intro: The XSD Infoset Model is a reference library for use with any code that examines, creates or modifies XML Schemas (standalone or as part of other artifacts, such as XForms or WSDL documents).
welcomePage.item: Learn More This is the official site of XSD: http://www.eclipse.org/xsd
